title: Royal Allegiance are looking to Trial Coaches for 2017

embed.description: Royal Allegiance are looking to trial Coaches for OOL 2017. Click the link below to submit an application. https://docs.google.com/forms/u/0/d/1oo22UdK05_dFve9Lj1LZbXlZ99NQnE18JULc9fSDJ8s/viewform?edit_requested=true

body:
Hey guys we are after some enthusiastic summoners who really love analysing game play and giving constructive criticism.
So basically a Coach:

Some requirements for the role:

Working microphone
Able to relay points effectively
Availability for Scrims
Pick and Ban
Vod reviews.

We aren't after experience however it is more appealing if you do have them. 
Actions speak louder than words therefore we want you to show us what you can do.

https://docs.google.com/forms/u/0/d/1oo22UdK05_dFve9Lj1LZbXlZ99NQnE18JULc9fSDJ8s/viewform?edit_requested=true

Please fill the application form above to apply. We eagerly await your response. But do allow us up to a week to get back to you as we have applications to go through.

replies.body: Any chance You could Flick me Some of the coaches who dont make it :) ?
